QB826.name: Introduction to Quantitative Biology Techniques
QB826.description: Interdisciplinary hands-on biology and computing methods.

QB830.name: Special Topics in Quantitative Biology
QB830.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
QB830.description: Selected topics in quantitative biology are covered at an advanced level, to include student presentations of the primary literature
QB830.restrictions: Open to undergraduate students or approval of college.
